text: Finland is scheduled to compete at the 2022 Winter Olympics in Beijing, China, from 4 to 20 February 2022. == Ice hockey == Finland has qualified 25 male competitors, and 23 female competitors to the ice hockey tournaments. ===Men's tournament=== Finland men's national ice hockey team qualified by being ranked 3rd in the 2019 IIHF World Rankings. They will play in Group C. ===Women's tournament=== Finland women's national ice hockey team qualified by being ranked 3rd in the 2020 IIHF World Rankings. They will play in Group A. ==References== Category:Nations at the 2022 Winter Olympics 2022 Winter Olympics
title: Finland at the 2022 Winter Olympics
